there is a stitch counting for each row nightfall shawl is a wonderful gentle triangle shaped shawl that has been designer to be crochet in lace weight yarn delicate lace pattern work to give an airy light and elegant shawl perfect to dress up anything you wear it with it will fit not only to daily clothes but also to wedding dress just make it in white/ecru the shawl is worked in row in one piece with continuous border added in the round because the shawl is worked bottom-up its length is easily adjusted **materials & tools ** 1 yarn malabrigo yarn silkpaca 50g = 384 meters 70% baby alpaca 30% silk 2 skeins for the shawl sample i used abril colorway 2 hook size 3mm adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge 3 tapestry needle to weave and hide yarn ends 4 scissor **level ** intermediate **notes ** the pattern uses us crochet terminology the shawl is worked bottom-up in one piece with a continuous border added in the round increases are made at the start and end of the row from row 26 until the edging the pattern is a simple 2 row repeat my shawl finished at the 80 row of the pattern and it s relatively large but you can make it smaller by working less pattern repeats pattern is written for lace weight yarn but light fingering or fingering weight yarn can also be used the pattern includes the stitch charts **multi-item discounts** 1 use code **3items** get
